title: Bangladesh to donate USD 2.3 Mn worth of medicines
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Bangladesh has confirmed a USD 2.3 million (Rs 830 million) worth donation of essential medicines to Sri Lanka, said Health Minister (Professor) Channa Jayasumana on Friday (6).
The donation consists 56 types of essential medicines, he added.
Harthal Friday : Transport, Health, Education, Public Service sectors affected
